'''Kaoha''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The harbormaster of [Neketaka](/neketaka/) docks, Kaoha is a proud Huana and an official of the ruling regime, which makes her a double annoyance. She's not too fond of non-Huana visiting her Great City.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[The Veins of Eora](/theVeinsOfEora/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Veins of Eora](/theVeinsOfEora/): And will be even less fond of them after your entrance.
